channel.title: Error launching server [508]
channel.description: Hey guys, just downloaded a new 508 source. I just tried to run it and it gave me a really long error: [code][2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionEx ception: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args cons tructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args con structor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:88) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceU nmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:77) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:81) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceU nmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.s tart(TreeUnmarshaller.java:142) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractTreeMarsha llingStrategy.unmarshal(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStre am.java:907) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStre am.java:893) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream .java:845) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.rs2hd.model.World.setEngine(World.java:407) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java:73) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:36) [2013/09/23 16:22:25] [Server]: java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] I don't really know what it means, can someone help me on this? I have team viewer if you would like to see for yourself.

item.title: Error launching server [508]
item.dc:creator: @FromAutumnToAshes FromAutumnToAshes
item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Thankyou so much!! Got it working :)!

Read full topic

item.title: Error launching server [508]
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

You should have a lib folder. In there replace the old xstream file with the new. Rename it to what it was originally to save time messing around with the launcher.

Read full topic

item.title: Error launching server [508]
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

Update the xstream jar file.

http://xstream.codehaus.org/download.html
